message:
While attending Sydney JavaScript usergroup this month (@SydJS), I recorded Patrick Roumanoff's (@pkr2) session on what JavaScript promises are the similarities and differences in implementing them in different JavaScript frameworks like jQuery & Angular.JS. Watch it!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sY9R68mhqI
name: SydJS June 2013 - The future is a promise
description: This is a recording from the session "The future is a promise" by "Patrick Roumanoff" (@pkr2 on twitter), recorded live in Sydney JavaScript usergroup gather...
